Class TestRunManager

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Business Layer test run management.

        public void validateTestSetRun(UserDto user,
                      com.intland.codebeamer.manager.testmanagement.TestRun testSetRun)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                               AccessRightsException
        Validates the "extra business rules" on the passed test set run. The rules that are to be applied to any arbowitrary tracker item are not checked here, as the final call will land in the TrackerItemManager.

      • createCompletedTestCaseRun

        public void createCompletedTestCaseRun(UserDto user,
                              com.intland.codebeamer.manager.testmanagement.TestRun testCaseRun,
                              com.intland.codebeamer.manager.testmanagement.TestRun.TestRunResult result,
                              java.util.List<com.intland.codebeamer.manager.testmanagement.TestStepWithResult> stepsResults,
                              java.lang.String uploadConversationId,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              com.intland.codebeamer.manager.testmanagement.parameters.TestParameters parameters)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                       AccessRightsException,
                                       ChangeVetoedException,
                                       java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                                       java.text.ParseException
        Propagation of status to the parent test set run, in order of precedence:
        1. test set run is "completed" if all its children are "completed"
        2. test set run is "in-progress" if that was in any other status
        Propagation of result when closing the parent test set run, in order of precedence:
        1. test set is "blocked" if it has at least one "blocked" child
        2. test set is "failed" if it has at least one "failed" child
        3. test set is "passed" otherwise (i.e. if all test cases are "passed")
        Parameters:
        user -
        testCaseRun -
        result - Optional result. If not provided then the result is auto-computed from the steps' result
        stepsResults - The result of each step
        uploadConversationId -
        request -
        parameters - The resolved test parameters used for running the tests. Can be null.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        AccessRightsException
        ChangeVetoedException
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException

      • getTestParametersNotYetRun

        public com.intland.codebeamer.manager.testmanagement.parameters.TestParameters<?> getTestParametersNotYetRun(com.intland.codebeamer.manager.testmanagement.parameters.TestParameters<?> params,

                                                                                                    com.intland.codebeamer.manager.testmanagement.TestCase testCase)
        Get the subset of input TestParameters which are not yet run. These are the parameters which has no result recorded...
        Returns:
        TestParameters to run

        Get the TestParameters separated to 2 groups: "left" which were already run and "right" which has not been run yet.
        Returns:
        Run and not-yet-run parameters. May return null if there are no parameters.

      • moveParameterizedTestsToCommonSingleParent

        public com.intland.codebeamer.manager.testmanagement.TestRun moveParameterizedTestsToCommonSingleParent(UserDto user,
                                                                                               com.intland.codebeamer.manager.testmanagement.TestRun testSetRun,

                                                                                                        ChangeVetoedException,
                                                                                                        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Move the parameterised test below a single/common non-parameterised test
        Parameters:
        user -
        testCase - The test-case being processed
        testCaseRun - Optional TestCaseRun being processed
        hasMoreParametersToRun - If there are more parameters that can be run. If no more parameters then the Test-run can be closed
        forceCreate - If the container is always created even when there was no parameterised test-run completed yet
        request -
        Returns:
        The container for test parameterised test-runs of the same Test
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
        AccessRightsException
        ChangeVetoedException
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
